name: Night of The Living Compost
description:
My Animation demo for my final school project (is buggy when spamming the move sets try not to do that)

This is Night of the Living Compost, an animation proof of concept for my 2022 games design class Final Major Project, you play as Agatha, a farmer who believes that the reason for her award-winning crop is the people she puts in it.

This game is very rough because I'm not really a coder, I must thank my teachers for being so lenient with the help they gave me. If you're are interested in more of my work here's my website https://hanmunro1018.wixsite.com/website-1 

Made with Unreal engine and Sprites animated in Krita
